name: Microsoft
description: Developer of Azure AI and Copilot; a leader in enterprise AI solutions and cloud infrastructure.

name: Apple
description: Integrates AI across consumer devices, with a focus on privacy-driven machine learning and on-device intelligence.

name: Nvidia
description: Core provider of GPUs powering modern AI workloads, with advances in generative AI and edge computing.

name: Google
description: Pioneers in AI research and deployment through DeepMind, Gemini, and Google Cloud AI platforms.

name: Meta
description: Invests in large-scale AI models for language, vision, and open-source frameworks through FAIR and LLaMA.

name: Amazon
description: AI powers everything from Alexa to AWS's AI/ML infrastructure and forecasting services.

name: IBM
description: Legacy innovator in enterprise AI via Watsonx, with deep vertical expertise in regulated industries.

name: Adobe
description: Blends creative tools with generative AI through Adobe Firefly and Sensei, reshaping digital workflows.

name: Palantir
description: Specializes in AI-driven data integration and operational intelligence for government and commercial sectors.

name: Tesla
description: Leverages AI for autonomous driving, energy optimization, and robotics through Dojo and FSD architectures.

name: CoreWeave
description: Specialized cloud provider optimized for AI workloads, offering GPU infrastructure for training and inference at scale.
